All Classes

Class Description
Action
Base class for Actions.
ActionList
A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.
Actor
An entity that is alive by having hit points.
ActorLocationsIterator
Represents a bimap of locations and actors.
Application
The main class to start the game.
AreaAttackAction
An action to perform an area attack
AreaAttackBehaviour
Class the represents the area attack behaviour used by certain enemies
AttackAction
An Action to attack another Actor.
AttackBehaviour
Class that represents the attackbehaviour used by NPCS
AttackType
Use this enum class to give actors factions based on who they can/cannot attack.
BecomePileOfBonesAction
Class that represents the action for become pile of boners
BecomePileOfBonesBehaviour
class that represents the become pile of bones behaviour used in Skeletons
Behaviour
Created by:
Buyable
An interface for objects that are buyable
BuyAction
An action to allow actors to buy items that are buyable
Canine
Abstract class that will represent the base Canines (currently Lone Wolf and Giant Dog)
CapabilitySet
A collection of Capability objects.
Capable
An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum.
Club
A simple weapon that can be used to attack the enemy.
Consumable
A interface the represents all items that will be used to heal
ConsumeAction
A consume action which represents all item that should be consumed
Crustacean
Abstract class represent the base crustacean actors
DeathAction
An action executed if an actor is killed.
DespawnAction
Class that represents the Despawn action which removes the actor from that map when executed
DespawnBehaviour
Class that that will return a new despawn action if the probablity is met
Dirt
A class that represents bare dirt.
Display
Class that manages I/O for the system
DoNothingAction
An Action that doesn't do anything.
DropAction
An abstract drop action class
DropItemAction
Special Action that allows Actors to drop items.
DropWeaponAction
Special Action that allows Actors to drop weapons.
Enemy
Class the represents the base enemy class and instantiates the behaviours that are similar to all enemies
Exit
Class that represents a route from one Location to another.
FancyGroundFactory
Class that can create different types of Ground based on the character that represents it.
FancyMessage
Fancy messages used to print the game title Font obtained from: https://patorjk.com/software/taag/#p=display&f=Georgia11&t= Font: Georgia11 Created by:
FlaskOfCrimsonTears
Class that represents the FLash of Crimson Tears item for our current implementation
Floor
A class that represents the floor inside a building.
FollowBehaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
GameMap
Class representing one map within the system.
GiantCrab
Class that represents the GiantCrab actor
GiantCrayfish
Class that represents the GiantCrayfish actor
GiantDog
Class that represents the Giant Dog actor
Graveyard
Class that represents the Graveyard SpawningGround which can spawn the HeavySkeletalSwordsman and SkeletalBandit
Grossmesser
A weapon carried by HeavySkeletalSwordsman.
Ground
Class representing terrain type
GroundFactory
Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
GustOfWind
Class that represents the GustofWind SpawningGround which can spawn the LoneWolf and GiantDog
HeavySkeletalSwordsman
Class that represents the Heavy Skeletal Swordsman extending from a skeleton
IntrinsicWeapon
Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed Actor (e.g.
Item
Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.
Location
Class representing a location in the game map.
LoneWolf
BEHOLD, DOG! Class that represents the LoneWolf actor in the game Created by:
Menu
A menu GUI implementations
MerchantK
Class that represents Merchant Kale, a trader who allows the player to buy/sell items
MoveActorAction
An Action that moves the Actor.
NumberRange
A class that represents an array of sequential numbers.
PickUpAction
An abstract pick up action class
PickUpItemAction
Action to allow items to be picked up.
PickUpWeaponAction
Action to allow weapons to be picked up.
PileOfBones
Class that represents the PileOfBones actor which will spawn when a Skeleton dies
Player
Class representing the Player.
Printable
Things that are Printable can appear in the user interface and therefore can be represented by a character in the UI.
PuddleOfWater
A class which represents the PuddleOfWater SpawningGround that spawns GiantCrabs and GiantCrayfish
RandomNumberGenerator
A random number generator Created by:
RemoveAction
Class that represents removal of actors when called
ResetManager
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables.
Resettable
A resettable interface Created by:
RestAction
A class that represents the 'rest action' implemented when standing on The First Step
RestLocationManager
A class that keeps track of rest location
RetrieveAction
abstract class that represents all items that may be retrieved
RetrieveRuneAction
Class that represents a retrieve rune action
Rune
Rune class represents a generic Rune which will be on the floor, mainly used for the Death Action, RetrieveRuneAction
RuneManager
A class that keeps track of RuneSources in the game and manages transfer of runes
RuneSource
An interface for RuneSources (anything that produces/transfers runes)
Scimitar
Class that represents the Scimitar weapon held by the skeletal bandit, also can be bought from Trader K
Sellable
An interface for objects that are sellable
SellAction
Class that represents the action to sell an item
SkeletalBandit
This class represents a base Skeletal Bandit
Skeleton
Abstract class that will hold the general behaviours of Skeletons
SpawningGround
A class that represents the abstract class SpawningGround, representing all ground that will spawn an actor.
Status
Use this enum class to represent certain capabilities within classes.
TheFirstStep
A class which represent TheFirstStep, which is our first Site of Lost Grace
Trader
An abstract class which will have the base capabilities of all Traders
Utils
A class that represents the static methods that can be accessed in other classes for clarity
Wall
Created by:
WanderBehaviour
Class that represents the Wanderbehaviour in NPCs that figures out where they move Created by:
Weapon
Interface for weapon items.
WeaponItem
Class representing items that can be used as a weapon.
World
Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
